definition.text: You may work with any of the markets listed at the exchange! Take a look at the setup in the Exchange Markets node!

translations.text: Puoi lavorare con ogni market presente sull'exchange! Dai un'occhiata al setup del nodo Exchange Markets.
¡Puedes trabajar con cualquiera de los mercados listados en el exchange! ¡Echa un vistazo a la configuración en el nodo Exchange Markets!

paragraphs.text: I'm not going to explain how to set up new markets as the topic is covered in the Install a New Market Tutorial in the Install a New Market Tutorial Plugin Workspace. I just wanted to let you know that it's easy!

translations.text: Non tratterò la cosa nel dettaglio, perchè ci penserà il tutorial Install a New Market Tutorial nel Tested Exchanges Plugin Workspace. Voglio solo dirti quanto sia facile!

No voy a explicar cómo configurar nuevos mercados, ya que el tema se trata en Install a New Market Tutorial in the Install a New Market Tutorial Plugin Workspace. ¡Solo quería hacerte saber que es fácil!

paragraphs.text: Take a look at the menu of the BTC/USDT Market! Notice the "Install Market" and "Uninstall Market" buttons! That's how you do it!

translations.text: Guarda il menù del market BTC\USDT, e trova i pulsanti Install Market e Uninstall Market. Ecco come si fa!
¡Eche un vistazo al menú del mercado BTC/USDT! Observe los botones "Install Market" y "Uninstall Market" . ¡Asi es como lo haces!

paragraphs.text: I'll leave it at that and let you do the Install a New Market Tutorial when the time is right!

translations.text: Non mi addentro oltre, lo farà Install a New Market Tutorial in seguito!
¡Lo dejaré así y te dejaré hacer el Install a New Market Tutorial cuando sea tu tiempo!
